tunnel-url.description: Use a custom tunnel, it must be running before executing dev. Format: "https://my-tunnel-url:port".

no-tunnel.name: no-tunnel
no-tunnel.description: Automatic creation of a tunnel is disabled. Service entry point will listen to localhost instead

theme-app-extension-port.description: Local port of the theme app extension development server.

notify.description: The file path or URL. The file path is to a file that you want updated on idle. The URL path is where you want a webhook posted to report on file changes.
